title: Scrapbook, ca. 1900
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: various weave structures
inscribed: in blue pencil on inside front cover, "No.17 Lavallieres"
dimensions: Closed book: 37 x 23.5 x 2 cm (14 9/16 x 9 1/4 x 13/16 in. )
description: Scrapbook, assembled in France, containing 186 textile swatches including 9 woven as ascots or ties and 1 woven as a handerkerchief corner.

tombstone.epitaph:
Scrapbook, ca. 1900. Medium: silk
Technique: various weave structures. 1967-54-2.
